nodes.name: Wait to stay within service limits

filters.q: subject: Job application for SDR, has:attachment

attributes.name: City
attributes.description: Extract the city in which candidate is currently residing

attributes.name: Full Name
attributes.description: Extract the full name of candidate

attributes.name: Email
attributes.description: Extract the email of the candidate only.

options.systemPromptTemplate:
You are an expert extraction algorithm.
Only extract relevant information from the text.
If you do not know the value of an attribute asked to extract, you may omit the attribute's value.

attributes.name: Job History
attributes.description: Work history summary, mentioning all companies and duration worked, focusing major impactful achievements and work done.

attributes.name: Skills
attributes.description: Extract the candidate’s technical skills. What software, frameworks, functional, business skills they are proficient in. Make a bulleted list.

attributes.name: Title & Employer
attributes.description: Extract all Job Title and Employer with working years. For Example Job Title- Account Executive , Employer - SAP, Working Years - 2 Year, Job Title- Account Manager , Employer - Salesforce, Working Years - 3 Year. Combine the experience by Employer.

attributes.name: Work Experience
attributes.description: Extract years of experience and group experience by job function or role type. Format Example: Total Years Exp: 7 - Account Executive: 2 years - Sales Development Representative: 2 years - Account Manager: 3 years

attributes.name: Promotions Checker
attributes.description: For an employees, check if candidates designation has changed. Count total number of senior changes (i.e advancement in position) across the entire working experience.

attributes.name: Education Information
attributes.description: Create a tabular list of colleges, schools attended along with graduation degree, certification, passing year and any notable achievement in education.

parameters.content:
## Step 1: Waiting for Resume.
This node is fetching resumes from Emails basis the specific Subject every hour.

## Data Extraction from Resume
This mode will identify personal, educational and professional info from Resume

## How to use LIamaIndex [Guide](https://developers.llamaindex.ai/typescript/cloud/llamaparse/getting_started/)
## LIamaIndex APIs v2 [API](https://developers.llamaindex.ai/cloud-api-reference/category/v-2)

json.markdown:
Mohammad Ismail
Artificial Intelligence and robotics
imoh40398@gmail.com | Amman, Jordan, Amman City Center, 11118 | 0787499976
GitHub • LinkedIn • Portfolio

# Summary

AI and Robotics graduate and Automation Engineer with hands-on experience in workflow automation, AI integration, and cloud deployment. Skilled in n8n, Docker, Prompt Engineering, and RAGs (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) for building intelligent, AI-driven systems. Experienced Backend Developer using FastAPI, building scalable APIs, authentication systems, and automation-ready services that integrate smoothly with modern AI and workflow tools. Delivered training to over 800 learners in AI, data science, and robotics, combining technical expertise with practical, project-based learning. Passionate about creating automation and AI solutions that enhance business efficiency and bridge the gap between artificial intelligence and real-world applications.

# Education

Bachelor of Artificial Intelligence and Robotics

Al-Balqa Applied University | Sep 2022 – Aug 2025

GPA: 3.82/4.0 — Graduated First in Class

# Technical Skills:

- Programming: Python, C/C++, Java, HTML/CSS, Bootstrap
- AI & Machine Learning: Computer Vision, Predictive Modeling, Transfer Learning, Supervised & Unsupervised Learning.
- Deep Learning & NLP: TensorFlow, PyTorch, CNNs, RNNs, HuggingFace, LangChain.
- Data & Analytics: Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib, Seaborn.
- Automation & DevOps: n8n, Docker, Workflow Automation, Cloud Deployment, API Integration, Task Orchestration.
- Backend & APIs: FastAPI, REST APIs, API Development
- Databases: Pinecone, FAISS, ChromaDB, PostgreSQL, Supabase
- Hardware & Robotics: Arduino, Mobile Robotics, Electronic Circuits.
- Tools & Platforms: Git, GitHub, Google Colab, Jupyter.
- Training & Mentorship: Delivered 200+ hours of technical training and workshops.

# EXPERIENCE:

- Academic Member – The Solid Code Team (Sep 2021 – Sep 2022)

Supported technical events and mentored junior students.
- Member – IEEE SIGHT (May 2024 – Dec 2024)

Participated in outreach and innovation projects.
- Workshop Manager – IEEE Robotics and Automation Society (Jul 2024 – Aug 2025)

Organized and delivered workshops on AI, data science, Arduino, and robotics, training 800+ students and managing large-scale technical events.
- Automation Engineer – Orbit (Sep 2025 – Dec 2025)

Developing and deploying automation workflows using n8n to optimize internal IT operations and technical processes.

# PROJECTS

- Dentelligence System
- D3aj Buggy
- PDF Question-Answering Chatbot
- AI modelthon 2025
- Arduino99 Course Content
- flower classifier

headers.user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/144.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

output.Job History: Mohammad Ismail has a diverse work history starting as an Academic Member at The Solid Code Team from Sep 2021 to Sep 2022, where he supported technical events and mentored junior students. He also served as a Member of IEEE SIGHT from May 2024 to Dec 2024, participating in outreach and innovation projects. From Jul 2024 to Aug 2025, he was a Workshop Manager for the IEEE Robotics and Automation Society, where he organized and delivered workshops on AI, data science, Arduino, and robotics, successfully training over 800 students and managing large-scale technical events. Most recently, from Sep 2025 to Dec 2025, he worked as an Automation Engineer at Orbit, developing and deploying automation workflows using n8n to optimize internal IT operations and technical processes.
